entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 27 except 31 near Osoyoos.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 27 except 31 near Osoyoos. Humidex 29 except 32 near Osoyoos. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low 13. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 40%
